code: import React,{useState}from'react';import hotels from'../data';import HotelCard from'./HotelCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HotelList=()=>{const[search,setSearch]=useState('');const filteredHotels=hotels.filter(hotel=>hotel.name.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase())||hotel.location.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase())||hotel.description.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"findoffers",className:"browse-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"title-middle",children:"Explore the hotels"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"searchbar",placeholder:"Search by hotel name, place etc.",value:search,onChange:e=>setSearch(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"grid hotel-cards",children:filteredHotels.map(hotel=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HotelCard,{hotel:hotel},hotel.id))})]});};export default HotelList;
